EmailTemplate.description: Subject: Get Your Gartner Report: Enable Virtual Data Center Control
EmailTemplate.name: Gartner Newsletter Mailing - B.Email B
EmailTemplate.subject: Get Your Gartner Report: Enable Virtual Data Center Control
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Software-Defined Control for your Software-Defined Data Center
Click here <http://gtnr.it/107S7Ya> to access your online newsletter brought to you by VMTurbo featuring research from Aneel Lakhani and Jonah Kowall at Gartner.
We believe that IT control, driven by intelligent automation, is a required capability to move beyond consolidation savings and fully unlock the value that virtualization brings to your data center infrastructure. This newsletter focuses on giving you a better understanding of how others are addressing this challenge with a unique approach to operations management – one that’s built on a software defined control platform that transforms IT operations from a complex, labor intensive, and volatile process to one that is simple, automated and predictable.
Read the full newsletter and download your complimentary Gartner report now <http://gtnr.it/107S7Ya>!
Sincerely,
The VMTurbo Team
